name: Shimla
description: Shimla is the capital city of Himachal Pradesh and one of India's most popular hill stations. Known for its colonial architecture, scenic beauty, and pleasant climate, it offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and natural beauty.

locations.name: The Ridge
locations.description: The heart of Shimla, offering panoramic views of the mountains and a vibrant atmosphere.

locations.name: Mall Road
locations.description: Famous shopping street with colonial architecture, cafes, and shops.

locations.name: Christ Church
locations.description: Second oldest church in North India, known for its neo-gothic architecture.

locations.name: Jakhu Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman, offering panoramic views of Shimla.

locations.name: Kufri
locations.description: Popular skiing destination with scenic views and adventure activities.
